content.question: Which of the following most directly led to the circumstances illustrated by the image?

choices.label: The United States victory in the Spanish-American War
The Supreme Court ruling in Plessy v. Ferguson
The United States contributions to the Allied victory in the First World War
The ratification of the Nineteenth Amendment to the Constitution

content.answer: The United States victory in the Spanish-American War

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
